Html:
When I start my application, I get a seemingly random window that pops up separate from my shell window.  I have no idea where it came from and can't seem to track down where it is being created.

Here is a link to an image of the problem.  Also, what kind of window has the default navigation buttons at the top left like this does?

Thanks for any help.
Actually...I just figured it out.  I think Blend might have been responsible for this.  My App.xaml had a startup URI set when before, it didn't have one.  Weird!
